net.livebookstore.business
Interface BusinessService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BusinessServiceImpl
@Transactional
public interface BusinessService

Core service interface for business logic. All data access operations like DAO are behind this service. Also this is the facade interactive with all controllers.

Author:
xuefeng

Method Detail

queryUserDetails

@Transactional(readOnly=true)
Account queryUserDetails(java.lang.String username)
Query Account's username, password and privilege for authentication.

Parameters:
username - Username to login.
Returns:
Account object but only username, password and privilege is available.

query

@Transactional(readOnly=true)
java.lang.Object query(java.lang.Class clazz,
                                     java.io.Serializable id)
Query a object by specified class name and id. If not found, a DataAccessException is thrown.

Parameters:
clazz - Class for object, e.g., Book.class.
id - Object's id.
Returns:
The object loaded by DAO.

queryAccounts

@Transactional(readOnly=true)
@Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
java.util.List<Account> queryAccounts(Page page,
                                                            boolean asc)
Query all accounts by page. Only "ROLE_ADMIN" role-based user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
page - Page information.
asc - Order by asc or desc.
Returns:
List of Account objects.

queryComments

@Transactional(readOnly=true)
java.util.List<Comment> queryComments(Book book,
                                                    Page page)
Query specified book's comments by page.

Parameters:
book - Book object that the comments belong to.
page - Page information.
Returns:
List of Comment objects.

queryOrders

@Transactional(readOnly=true)
@Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
java.util.List<Order> queryOrders(Page page)
Query orders by page. Only "ROLE_ADMIN" role-based user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
page - The page information.
Returns:
List of Order objects.

queryOrders

@Transactional(readOnly=true)
@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
java.util.List<Order> queryOrders(Account account,
                                                        Page page)
Query specified account's orders by page. Only current user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
account - Account object that the orders belong to.
page - Page information.
Returns:
List of Order objects.

@Transactional(readOnly=true)
@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
java.util.List<Book> queryFavorite(Account account,
                                                         Page page)
Query specified account's favorite books. Only current user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
account - Account object that the favorites belong to.
page - Page information.
Returns:
List of Book objects.

queryRoot

@Transactional(propagation=SUPPORTS,
               readOnly=true)
Category queryRoot()
Query root Category object.

Returns:
The root category object.

queryTopSales

java.util.List<Book> queryTopSales(Category c,
                                                 int max)
Query top-sale books belong to specified category.

Parameters:
c - The Category object.
max - Max books.
Returns:
List of Book objects.

createFavorite

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
boolean createFavorite(Account account,
                               Book book)
Add a Book to user's favorite list. Only current user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
account - The Account object.
book - The Book object.
Returns:
True if added successfully, false if Book is already exist in user's favorite list.

createAccount

void createAccount(Account account)
Do user registration and create a new Account object.

Parameters:
account - The new Account object.

createBook

@Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
void createBook(Book book)
Create a new Book object. Only "ROLE_ADMIN" role-based user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
book - The new Book object.

createComment

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
void createComment(Comment comment)
Create a new Comment on specified book. Only current user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
comment - The new Comment object which already contains a reference of Book object it belongs to.

createCategory

@Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
void createCategory(Category category,
                            java.lang.Integer parentId)
Create a new Category object. Only "ROLE_ADMIN" role-based user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
category - The new Category object.
parentId - Specify its parent's id.

createOrder

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
void createOrder(Order order,
                         java.util.List<OrderItem> items)
Create a new Order. Only current user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
order - The new Order object which already contains a reference of Account object it belongs to.
items - The list of OrderItem to describe the order's each item.

Update an Account object. Only current user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
account - The Account object.

Parameters:

void updateCategory(Category category)

Parameters:
category - The Category object.

cancelOrder

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
void cancelOrder(Order order)
Cancel an exist non-processing Order. Only current user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
order - The Order object.

updateOrder

@Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
void updateOrder(Order order,
                         int newState)
Process the Order. Only "ROLE_ADMIN" role-based user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
order - The Order object.
newState - Set new state of the Order object, such as Order.STATE_COMPLETE, Order.STATE_DELIVER.

delete

@Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
void delete(java.lang.Object object)
Delete a Book, Category or Comment object. Only "ROLE_ADMIN" role-based user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
object - Object to be deleted.

deleteFavorite

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
void deleteFavorite(Account account,
                            Book book)
Delete an Account's favorite book. Only current user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
account - The Account object.
book - The Book object.

changePassword

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
void changePassword(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String oldPassword,
                            java.lang.String newPassword)
Change the account's password. Only current user can call this method, otherwise an AccessDeniedException is thrown.

Parameters:
username - The current Account's username.
oldPassword - The old password.
newPassword - The new password.
